text.text_translated: Sometimes, it is hard to understand why a bridge falls down. Experts only find the reason after a complete study. This can happen if builders used low-quality material. It can also happen if an important part of the bridge had a problem. In other cases, the bridge was designed to hold only a certain amount of weight and not more.

feedback.feedback: PASS. The feedback is direct, blunt, and concise. It clearly states the two reasons for failure (sentence length, vocabulary level) and provides specific, quoted evidence for each claim ('In other cases, the bridge was designed...', 'Experts').
